name: Jelly vs Shrimp
description:
Play as a jellyfish avoiding waves of shrimp attacking it in this quick bullet hell.

This is another game that was made in a week. Due to this what is on this page is the final version of the game.

CONTROLS: 

- mouse to aim

- click to jet toward the mouse

HOW TO PLAY:

avoid the shrimp as long as you can. 

CREDITS: 

Game by Ford 4466

Font from TinyWorld on itch

pallet from Klafooty-lospec on losepc
